Shikamaru materialises and personifies his shadow into two different Shikamaru shaped shadows. Each shadow punches the opponent once and then both shadows coil around the opponent and crushes them.

[[es:Jutsu: Simulación de Sombra Humana]]
[[pt-br:Técnica da Silhueta das Sombras]]
